Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: every piece of feedback gen ai gave me had to be taken with a grain of salt, as it does not understand the context in which my work was written, whereas i could know that my teacher knew what they were talking about & were concerned about me doing well in the class. however, teachers are less available to provide feedback especially before i hand an assignment in.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: sometimes teacher feedback would confuse me & i was unable to seek further understanding from the teacher which frustrated me. i was always able to ask gen ai further questions, but its feedback was less accurate for my assignment
